channel.title: awos News
channel.description: News for awos, the purely functional Linux distribution.

item.title: awos 18.09 released
item.description: awos 18.09 “Jellyfish” has been released, the tenth stable release branch. See the release notes for details. You can get awos 18.09 ISOs and VirtualBox appliances from the download page. For information on how to upgrade from older release branches to 18.09, check out the manual section on upgrading.
